channel.title: Spyder LTD [Site, Client, Server]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i122.photobucket.com/albums/o262/evolutionne/SSAd.jpg[/img][/center] [center][size=20pt]SpyderScape [Client/Server][/size] The Client is [|||||||||| ~ 90%] Done. This server is [|||||||||| ~ 50%] Done. The website/forum is [|||||||||| ~ 20%] Done.[/center] [center] [u]This server needs the following staff:[/u][/center]
[center][b]::[/b] [u]Co-owner Spots[/u] [b]::[/b] eczema3
[b]::[/b] [u]Client Designer/Coder Spots[/u] [b]::[/b] ---OPEN--- ---OPEN--- ---OPEN---
[b]::[/b] [u]General Manager's (Mod/Server Manager)[/u] [b]::[/b] ---OPEN--- ---OPEN---
[b]::[/b] [u]Super Moderator[/u] [b]::[/b] ---OPEN--- ---OPEN--- ---OPEN--- ---OPEN--- ---OPEN--- ---OPEN---
[b]::[/b] [u]Server Moderator[/u] [b]::[/b] ---OPEN--- ---OPEN--- ---OPEN--- ---OPEN--- ---OPEN--- ---OPEN---
[b]::[/b] [u]Designer[/u] [b]::[/b] ---OPEN---
[b]::[/b] [u]Server Hoster (All day perhaps?)[/u] [b]::[/b] ---OPEN---
[size=20pt] [shadow=blue,right][font=Verdana][b]SpyderScape Client Screenshots[/b][/font][/shadow][/size] [IMG]http://i122.photobucket.com/albums/o262/evolutionne/ssclient1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i122.photobucket.com/albums/o262/evolutionne/ssclient2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i122.photobucket.com/albums/o262/evolutionne/ssclient3.png[/img]
[b][u][glow=red,2,300][shadow=red,left][size=20pt][font=Verdana]USE THIS FORM TO APPLY![/font][/size][/shadow][/glow][/u][/b] [/center] [code]What is your Name? AIM Screen name? YIM Screen name? MSN Screen name? (REQUIRED) E-Mail? Experience with RS2 Servers? Job applying for? How do you declare? What is your Age? Silabs Items, or Jagex Items?[/code]
Thank you for reading this message, I hope you all feel free into joining the team. I could use all te help I need, and this server will be one of the TOP 10 if you join Spyder LTD.

@eczema3 wrote:

What is your Name? eczema3?

E-Mail? alex@stupidnoob.co.uk
Experience with RS2 Servers? im alright i guess, i made talbon isle.
Job applying for? forum admin, server admin, and server coder
How do you declare? declare what?
What is your Age? 14
Silabs Items, or Jagex Items? jagex, duh?
